bibl.title: Fifty Oxyrhynchus Papyri (P. Oxy. Hels.)
bibl.seg: Zilliacus Henrik, Jaakko Frösén, Paavo Hohti, Jorma Kaimio and Maarit Kaimio, Fifty Oxyrhynchus Papyri (P. Oxy. Hels.). (Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 63, 1979.)
Helsinki, Societas Scientiarum Fennica, 1979, 8°, [xiv]-226 pp. et 37 pll.

C.R. par A. Blanchard, REG 94 (1981) pp. 550-551. - E. Boswinkel, Mnemosyne 4a s., 36 (1983) pp. 452-454. - W. Brashear, BibO 38 (1981) coll. 320-323. - P. Bureth, REA 83 (1981) p. 124. - B.E. Klakowicz, StPap 20 (1981) pp. 57-60. - J. Lenaerts, ChrEg 55 (1980) Nos 109-110, pp. 325-332. - Hubert Metzger, AnzAW 39 (1986) coll. 110-111. - L. Migliardi Zingale, Maia N.S., 34 (1982) pp. 98-99. - J.H. Oliver, AJP 101 (1980) pp. 228-233. - J.A. Straus, AntCl 49 (1980) pp. 473-475. - J.D. Thomas, CR N.S., 32 (1982) pp. 114-115.
